title: Chicken Pad Thai
ingredients: For sauce: 3 tbsp tamarind concentrate, 3 tbsp fish sauce, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 1 tbsp soy sauce
Lime wedges and cilantro for serving
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until pliable; drain.
Whisk sauce ingredients together until sugar dissolves.
Stir-fry chicken in hot oil until cooked. Push aside, scramble eggs until just set.
Add noodles and sauce. Toss over medium-high heat until noodles are glossy and coated.
Add bean sprouts and green onions; cook 1 minute.
Plate and top with peanuts, cilantro, and lime.
notes: Balance sauce to taste: more tamarind for tang, more sugar for sweetness.
